title: Escaping Fear
description: Ros and her friends are sick of all the struggles and tragedies. They finally found their sanctuary and now, all they want is to be left alone... and to survive. But when someone wanders onto their newly acquired property, will they be able to stay safe? How much more suffering can Ros endure? Loss. Distress. Survival. The fight to live continues in “Escaping Fear” the fifth book in The Ravaged Land Series!
author: Kellee L. Greene
